Hi, I'm Nicole. A brand new
UX Designer!
Resume

Background & Interests

Here are some of my skills

Print Production

I have 3 years working in the print industry. One year as full-time Graphic Designer, the other 2 years were as a customer service representative. That means I have practice communicating with clients and understand the complexity of color across media.

Freelance

One of my favorite things to do is help family or friends with their projects. I’ve been doing freelance since 2015. My work includes branding, announcements, and other materials as needed.

Interaction Design

Interaction design is the next thing I hope to explore. I enjoy personal developement. To illustrate that, you may be interested to know that I used this porfolio to learn & practice my basic HTML, CSS, and Javascript skills. It's been a fun challenge.

Journey

Everyone has their story, this is mine.

  • 2019

    General Assembly

    10 week immersive User Experience Design course. This included 5 projects, during a 9-5 work day 5 days a week.

  • 2017

    AlphaGraphics

    This is where I got the bulk of my design experience specifically in print. I worked a lot in cross-functional teams, discovered my own design process and honed my abilities in design thinking to solve business and client communication problems. Discovering, understanding, and defining the actual problem is a big aspect in any UX position.

  • 2016

    Deseret Digital Media

    As an intern at Deseret Digital Media I learned what a creative and deadline drivien atmosphere felt like. I was specifically part of Story Lab where we tested new ways to tell stories. I worked on video, flat or vector design for infographics, and social media posts.

  • 2015

    Cocoa Branding

    This was an internship at a branding studio in Guadalajara Mexico. What an adventure! I Loved learning from an international team, eating Mexican street food, and practicing my Spanish. I continued to develop my love for typography at Cocoa Branding.

  • Here's
    my
    Resume

Oh, and in my free time... I love the outdoors. Rockclimbing has been a hobby of mine as of late. I’d love to try kite boarding or surfing next!
